metadata.name: Default Credentials Usage
metadata.comment: Before deploying any new asset, change all default passwords to have values consistent with administrative level accounts. Sigma detects default credentials usage. Sigma for Qualys vulnerability scanner. Scan type - Vulnerability Management.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_finding WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (exists(vulnerabilities, x -> x.desc in (CAST(10693 AS STRING), CAST(11507 AS STRING), CAST(11633 AS STRING), CAST(11804 AS STRING), CAST(11821 AS STRING), CAST(11847 AS STRING), CAST(11867 AS STRING), CAST(11931 AS STRING), CAST(11935 AS STRING), CAST(11950 AS STRING), CAST(12541 AS STRING), CAST(12558 AS STRING), CAST(12559 AS STRING), CAST(12560 AS STRING), CAST(12562 AS STRING), CAST(12563 AS STRING), CAST(12565 AS STRING), CAST(12587 AS STRING), CAST(12590 AS STRING), CAST(12599 AS STRING), CAST(12702 AS STRING), CAST(12705 AS STRING), CAST(12706 AS STRING), CAST(12907 AS STRING), CAST(12928 AS STRING), CAST(12929 AS STRING), CAST(13053 AS STRING), CAST(13178 AS STRING), CAST(13200 AS STRING), CAST(13218 AS STRING), CAST(13241 AS STRING), CAST(13253 AS STRING), CAST(13274 AS STRING), CAST(13296 AS STRING), CAST(13301 AS STRING), CAST(13327 AS STRING), CAST(13373 AS STRING), CAST(13374 AS STRING), CAST(13409 AS STRING), CAST(13530 AS STRING), CAST(13532 AS STRING), CAST(20065 AS STRING), CAST(20073 AS STRING), CAST(20081 AS STRING), CAST(27202 AS STRING), CAST(27358 AS STRING), CAST(38702 AS STRING), CAST(38719 AS STRING), CAST(42045 AS STRING), CAST(42417 AS STRING), CAST(43029 AS STRING), CAST(43220 AS STRING), CAST(43221 AS STRING), CAST(43222 AS STRING), CAST(43223 AS STRING), CAST(43225 AS STRING), CAST(43246 AS STRING), CAST(43431 AS STRING), CAST(43484 AS STRING), CAST(86857 AS STRING), CAST(87098 AS STRING), CAST(87106 AS STRING))))

output.summary: Before deploying any new asset, change all default passwords to have values consistent with administrative level accounts. Sigma detects default credentials usage. Sigma for Qualys vulnerability scanner. Scan type - Vulnerability Management.
